item.title: PlantingTrees
item.description: Original Author/link Described by Yifat Ben-David Kolikant (Kolinkat2001). Two introduction questions presented by Steven Bogaerts as part of his “real-life analogies” (Bogaerts2014, Bogaerts2017). No public description avaialable. See Details section for more information. Details Start with some generals questions from Steven Bogaerts: “If I can shovel my driveway in 1 hour, how long would you expect it to take if someone equally capable were to help me?” “If one person can dig a hole with a shovel in 100 seconds, how long will it take for 10 people to dig that hole?
